topic: Absurde bids to complete stunning international double for Willie Mullins in Melbourne Cup

ideas.title: Absurde's Meditation
ideas.premise: Absurde, wearing a tiny prayer bead necklace, sits cross-legged, meditating, with a betting form in front of him instead of a mantra.
ideas.why_funny: Juxtaposes the religious context and the high-stakes gambling culture of the Cup.

ideas.title: Qantas Red Tail 'Special'
ideas.premise: A horse (presumably Absurde) wearing a Qantas red tail struggles to pull a massive roulette wheel labelled 'Melbourne Cup', hinting at the high-stakes involved
ideas.why_funny: Plays on the Qantas sale and the feeling of gambling your way to victory.

ideas.title: Monk's New Tip
ideas.premise: Two racegoers whispering; one says, 'I got a hot tip from a monk,' the other replies, 'Hope it's better than his last conviction!'
ideas.why_funny: Dark humour mixing the Melbourne Cup and the scandalous news item.

ideas.title: Michelle's Bad Leg Day
ideas.premise: Michelle Monaghan tripping over a rogue sausage roll at Derby Day with the caption "My Leg!"
ideas.why_funny: References her Derby Day appearance with a classic Aussie event mishap.

ideas.title: Willie's 'Absurde' Plan
ideas.premise: Willie Mullins explaining his Melbourne Cup strategy on a whiteboard filled with nonsensical diagrams and labelled 'Absurde' Plan.
ideas.why_funny: Highlights the absurdity of winning a huge international double.

headlines.title: What time is the Melbourne Cup? How to watch and the weather forecast
headlines.summary: Rain in Melbourne is set to play a factor in Australia's most famous horse race, with Flemington Racecourse predicted to be rated a Soft 7 or Heavy 8

headlines.title: Michelle Monaghan Shows Off Some Leg & Has 'A Hoot' at Derby Day 2025
headlines.summary: Michelle Monaghan is putting her leg on display! The 49-year-old The White Lotus star stepped out for the 2025 Derby Day held at Flemington Racecourse
